summary: Creating HDF5 file named "mytestfile.hdf5", with a dataset "myset" of size 100 with boolean dtype.

details.comment: Creating HDF5 file named "mytestfile.hdf5", with a dataset "myset" of size 100 with boolean dtype.
details.content:
import h5py
# import numpy as np
with h5py.File("mytestfile.hdf5", "w") as f:
    # dset = f.create_dataset("mydataset", (100,), dtype='i')
    f.create_dataset("myset", (100,), dtype="b")
